discworld

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • discworld.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    Player class is to give each player a personality card, ten dollars, green cards and brown cards.
    Version:
    2.00, 12 March 2015
    Author:
    Shu Liu, Zixi Quan and Jay Tanna

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(int id, int money, CardColor color, int minion, int building, PersonalityCard personalityCard, ArrayList<BoardCard> holdingCards)
      Constructs an instance of player class with the given parameters.
      Player(String s, CardColor cardcolor, Vector<PersonalityCard> personalitycards, Vector<BoardCard> greencard, Vector<BoardCard> browncard)
      The Player constructor shows all the information,name of personality cards, greencard and browncard

      • Player

        public Player(int id,
              int money,
              CardColor color,
              int minion,
              int building,
              PersonalityCard personalityCard,
              ArrayList<BoardCard> holdingCards)
        Constructs an instance of player class with the given parameters. This constructor will create a player with the id,money,color, minion,building,personalityCard and the holdingCards.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the player
        money - It shows how much amount a player has
        color - It shows the color of the player
        minion - It shows the number of minions a player have
        building - It shows the number of buildings a player have
        personalityCard - It shows the name of the personalityCard of a player
        holdingCards - It shows the name of all the holdingCards
